# diathor

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

DiaThor calculates several diatom-based indices commonly used for water quality assesment, directly from your species' data

## Installation

You can install the released version of diathor from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("diathor")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jcochero/DiaThor/")
```
